this is easily the best jerk chicken plate in rockaway, and itâ€™s not even close. i ordered 5 jerk chicken dinners plus some sides, and the very helpful young man working hooked me up with great service, which is RARE in far rockaway. my whole order was ready in a couple of minutes, and mind you, he was getting fresh chicken right off the grill and chopping it up. the macaroni and cheese was perfect, not too cheesy and nicely seasoned, the rice and peas were cooked on point. honestly, just go get the food, you wonâ€™t regret it. hell, iâ€™m about to go get lunch from there ğŸ˜‚ very good food thatâ€™s worth your money is gonna do it every single time!
The food is awesome
My favorite place to get a lunch and her prices are great. Glad I found this place
Best West indian food in the Area.  My go to spot when I don't want to cook

Their Jerk chicken was always tasty, this day not. I guess they ran out  of chicken and made a new batch and they did not get a chance to make it marinate, because it taste like it was not season at all.
